meanings.sent1: The students outnumber the teachers in the classroom.
meanings.sent2: During the game, the players outnumbered the referees.
meanings.sent3: The cookies outnumbered the vegetables at the party.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the sky easily outnumber the grains of sand on the beach.
meanings.sent5: The birds in the park greatly outnumber the squirrels.

meanings.sent1: The votes for the winning candidate outnumbered those for the other contenders.
meanings.sent2: The number of books on the shelf outnumbered the available space.
meanings.sent3: The balloons at the party outnumbered the guests.
meanings.sent4: The cheers from the crowd outnumbered the sounds of the music.
meanings.sent5: The flowers in the garden beautifully outnumber the weeds.
